==== Report ====

The presentation of FOSS was followed by an installation "live" of Ubuntu 11.04, included additional steps to do after installation. 

Workshops were organized to introduce other software (Windows and Linux) (OpenOffice/LibreOffice, Thunderbird, IRFANview and antivirus Avast).

Volunteers: 2 from Ubuntuu-be and 5 from Zandletters.be. 

Approximately 50 interested persons participated to the activity.
